title: Unnao Rape Survivor Has Not Passed Away, She’s on Ventilator
subtitle: Viral Image Fact Check: A press release issued by King George’s Medical University, Lucknow on Thursday, 1 August stated that Unnao rape survivor is currently on ventilator.  Hence, the claim that she has passed away is completely false.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Over 25 months after she was raped, the survivor, on 28 July, was travelling with her lawyer and her two aunts when a truck collided with their car in Rai Bareli. While her aunts succumbed to their injuries, the lawyer and the survivor herself are critically injured.

The Unnao case pertains to the gang-rape of the woman between 11 and 20 June 2017, allegedly by Shubham Singh, his driver Naresh Tiwari and one Brijesh Yadav. Before that, the girl was allegedly raped by BJP MLA Kuldeep Singh Sengar at his residence in Makhi village on 4 June 2017. Sengar has been in jail since 2018.

The Quint has not been able to independently verify the image attached with the viral posts but the claim that the girl has passed away is completely false. The story will be updated once we get a confirmation
